1512763866_1FqWuFMghrhssAGMfzihrY7y8Fw8s.body: Its recent growth is indisputably a bubble. I'm sure it continue to go up for a few months but its growth isn't sustainable. So make your money now while you can. Personally I think Bitcoin is a great sample of the public leger (blockchain), tokenization, and DAO concepts that will impact society over the next few years.
